Requirement: Users must view a dashboard displaying all connected devices with current status (online/offline, on/off, dimmer level)
Users must toggle device states: ON/OFF for lights and outlets, dimming levels 0-100% for compatible lights
Users must select and activate predefined lighting scenes from scene picker interface
Users must control circuit breaker states (on/off) and view breaker status/trip notifications
Users must create automation rules with time-based triggers (specific times, sunset/sunrise, recurring schedules)
Users must edit and delete existing automation rules
Automation rules must execute at scheduled times and change target device states accordingly
System must prevent creation of conflicting or invalid automation rules (invalid times, conflicting schedules)
